mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_refund ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, handling_date, user_id, name, receive_type_id, amount, pre_refund_amount, bank_name, bank_account, bsb, refund_date, refund_amount, gst, deduct_gst, refund, adviser_id, official_id, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{handlingDate}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{amount}, #{preRefundAmount}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{bsb}, #{refundDate}, #{refundAmount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{refund}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, 0);
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(bonus), 0.00) from b_refund where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and is_close = 0;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, name, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, amount, pre_refund_amount AS preRefundAmount, bank_name AS bankName, bank_account AS bankAccount, bsb, refund_date AS refundDate, refund_amount AS refundAmount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, refund, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, is_close AS isClose FROM b_refund WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_refund WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
